chapter.text: 15|1|alihp lam ra. (Napiye!) Ivai (muntiya) vetankalutaiya innum telivana (inta) kur'anutaiya (cila) vacanankalakum
15|2|tankalum muslimkalaka iruntirukka ventume? Enru nirakarippavarkal (marumaiyil) peritum virumpuvar

15|3|(napiye!) Avarkal (nanku) pucittukkontum, (tankal istappati) cukam anupavittuk kontum irukka (tarcamayam) nir avarkalai vittuvituviraka. Avarkalutaiya (vin) nampikkaikal (marumaiyai avarkalukku) marakkatittu vittana. Itan (palanai) pinnar avarkal nankarintu kolvarkal
15|4|(pavattil mulkiya) evvuraraiyum avarkalukkuk kurippitta tavanaiyileye tavira nam avarkalai alittu vitavillai
15|5|ovvoru kuttattarum tankal tavanaiyai muntavum mattarkal; pintavum mattarkal
15|6|(Nam napiyakiya um'mai nokki) ‘‘vetam arulappattatakak kurukinra nir niccayamakap paittiyakkarartan'' enru kurukinranar
15|7|‘‘meyyakave nir unmai colpavaraka iruntal (umakkuc catciyaka) nir vanavarkalai alaittuk kontuvara ventama? (Enrum kurukinranar)
15|8|(napiye!) Nam vanavarkalai irakkivaippatellam evarutaiya kariyattaiyum alittu mutittuvitak karutinaltan. Accamayam avarkalukkuc ciritum avakacam kotukkappatuvatillai. (Utane alikkappattuvituvar)
15|9|niccayamaka namtan ivvetattai (um mitu) irakkivaittom. Akave, (atil ettakaiya marutalum alivum erpatatavaru) niccayamaka name ataip patukattuk kolvom
15|10|(napiye!) Umakku munnar cenrupona kuttankalukkum niccayamaka nam tutarkal palarai anuppivaittom
15|11|(eninum,) avarkalitam (namatu) tutar evar vantapotilum avarkal avaraip parikacam ceyyatirukkavillai
15|12|(avarkal ullankalilirunta) nirakarippaip polave ikkurravalikalin ullankalilum (nirakarippaip) pukuttivittom
15|13|(akave,) ivarkal nampikkai kollave mattarkal. Mun cenravarkalutaiya nataimurai cenrirukkiratu. (Avarkal alintatu pola ivarkalum alintu vituvar)
15|14|vanattil oru vacalai ivarkalukku nam tirantuvittu, atil pakal nerattile ivarkal eriyapotilum (nampikkai kollamal)
15|15|‘‘enkal kankal mayankivittana; nankal cuniyam ceyyappattu vittom'' enre kuruvarkal. (Unmaiyai nampamattarkal)
15|16|niccayamaka namtan vanattil periya periya natcattirankalai amaittu parppavarkalukku atai alankaramakavum akki vaittom
15|17|virattappatta ovvoru saittanum avarrai nerunkatu kattukkontom

15|18|Akave, (vanavarkalin) oru varttaiyait tiruttuttanamakak kettup povatait tavira, (saittan avarrai nerunka mutiyatu. Avvaru saittan nerunkinal cutar vicum) erikinra neruppu juvalai atai (virattip) pin totarntu cellum
15|19|nam pumiyai virittu, atil urutimikka acaiyata malaikalai nattinom. Ovvoru purpuntaiyum (atarkuriya) olunkana muraiyil atil nam mulaippittom
15|20|unkalukkum, ninkal unavu kotuttu valarkkatatumana (akayattilum pumiyilum vacikkinra ennarra) uyirinankalukkum valkkaikku ventiya porulkalai name atil amaittom
15|21|ovvoru porulin pokkisankalum nam'mitame irukkinrana. Eninum, avarrai (antantak kalattil avarrirkuk) kurippitta alaviltan nam irakki vaikkirom

15|22|mekam karukkollumpatiyana karraiyum name anuppivaikkirom. Am'mekattiliruntu malaiyaiyum name poliyac ceykirom. Atai nam unkalukkup pukattukirom. (Malai nirai mekattilum, nilattilum) ninkal cekarittu vaikkavillai; (namtan cekarikkirom)
15|23|niccayamaka namtan uyir kotukkirom; name maranikkac ceyvom. Anaittirkum name varicukal! (Contakkararkal)
15|24|unkalukku mun cenravarkalaiyum niccayamaka nam arivom; (unkalukkup) pin varakkutiyavarkalaiyum niccayamaka nam arivom
15|25|(napiye!) Niccayamaka umatu iraivantan ivarkal anaivaraiyum (vicaranaikkaka marumaiyil tan mun) onru kuttuvan. Niccayamaka avan nanamutaiyavan, (anaittaiyum) nankarintavan avan
15|26|(kayntapin ‘kan kan' enru) captam kotukkakkutiya picupicuppana kalimannal niccayamaka name (unkal mulap pitavakiya mutal) manitanai pataittom
15|27|Atarku munnataka jinkalaik kotiya usnamulla neruppiliruntu pataittom
15|28|(napiye!) Umatu iraivan vanavarkalai nokki ‘‘niccayamaka nan, manitanai (kayntapin) captam kotukkakkutiya picupicuppana kalimannal pataikkappokiren'' enru kuriya camayattil
15|29|‘‘nan manitanai uruvakki atil en (pataippukku ventiya) uyiraip pukuttinal avarukku (mariyatai celutta) ninkal ciram paniyunkal'' (enru kuri, piraku, cirampaniya kattalaiyittan)
15|30|avvare vanavarkal anaivarum (avarukku mariyatai celutta) ciram panintarkal
15|31|iplisait tavira; (avan) ciram panintavarkalutan cerntu ciram paniyatu vilakik kontan
15|32|(atarku umatu iraivan iplisai nokki) ‘‘iplise! Ciram panintavarkalutan cerntu niyum ciram paniyata karanamenna?'' Enru kettan

15|33|atarkavan ‘‘(kayntapin) captam kotukkakkutiya picupicuppana kalimannal ni pataitta manitanukku (neruppal pataikkappatta) nan ciram paniya tayarillai; (enenral, nan avaraivita melanavan)'' enru kurinan
15|34|atarku iraivan ‘‘ni inkiruntu appurappattuvitu. Niccayamaka ni (namatu camukattiliruntu) virattappattu vittay'' enru kurinan
15|35|melum, ‘‘vicaranai nal (varum) varai un mitu niccayamaka en capamum (kopamum) untavataka!'' (Enrum kurinan)
15|36|atarkavan ‘‘en iraivane! (Irantavarkal) uyir perrelumpum nal (varum) varai ni enakku avakacamali'' enru kettan
15|37|atarku (iraivan) ‘‘niccayamaka (avvare) kurippitta annal varaiyilum unakku avakacamalikkappattatu'' enran
15|38|atarku (iraivan) ‘‘niccayamaka (avvare) kurippitta annal varaiyilum unakku avakacamalikkappattatu'' enran
15|39|Atarkavan ‘‘en iraivane! Ni ennai vali ketuttatan karanamaka pumiyilulla (porulkalai) nan avarkalukku alakakak kanpittu avarkal anaivaraiyum valiketuppen
15|40|eninum, avarkalil kalapparra (paricutta) ullattai utaiya un (nalla) atiyarkalait tavira; (avarkalai vali ketukka ennal mutiyatu)'' enru kurinan
15|41|atarku (iraivan) kuriyatavatu: ‘‘Atutan ennitam (varuvatarkuriya) nerana vali.’‘
15|42|(Manattuymaiyutaiya) en atiyarkalitattil niccayamaka unakku oru celvakkum irukkatu. Valikettil unnaip pinparriyavarkalait tavira
15|43|(unnaip pinparriya) anaivarukkum vakkalikkappatta itam niccayamaka narakamtan
15|44|annarakattirku elu vacalkal irukkinrana. Ovvoru vacalilum (cellakkutiya vakaiyil) avarkal pala pirivukalakap pirikkappattu vituvarkal
15|45|niccayamaka, iraiyaccamutaiyavarkalo corkkankalilum (atilulla) niraruvikalilum (ullacamaka) irupparkal
15|46|(avarkalai nokki) ninkal iterrattutanum accamarravarkalakavum itil nulaiyunkal'' (enru kurappatum)
15|47|(oruvarukku oruvarmitu im'maiyil) avarkalin nencankalil irunta kurotankalai nam nikkivituvom. (Avarkalum) cakotararkalaka oruvar oruvarai mukam nokki kattilkalil (ullacamakac cayntu) irupparkal
15|48|atil avarkalai oru ciramamum anukatu. Atil iruntu avarkal veliyerrappatavum mattarkal
15|49|(napiye!) Nir en atiyarkalukku arivippiraka: ‘‘Niccayamaka nan mikka mannippavan, mikak karunaiyutaiyavan aven
15|50|innum niccayamaka en vetanaitan mikka kotiya vetanai
15|51|(napiye!) Iprahimutaiya viruntalikalin varalarrai nir avarkalukku arivippiraka
15|52|Avarkal iprahimitam cenru ‘salamun' (unkalukku iterram untavataka!) Enru kuriyatarku, avar ‘‘niccayamaka nan unkalaip parri payappatukiren' enrar
15|53|atarkavarkal, ‘‘nir payappatatir. Niccayamaka nam umakku mikka nanamutaiya or makan oruvaraik kontu narceyti kurukirom'' enru kurinarkal
15|54|atarkavar ‘‘im'mutumaiyila ninkal enakku makanaik kontu narceyti kurukirirkal!'' Enru kurinar
15|55|atarkavarkal, (‘‘parikacamaka alla) meyyakave nankal umakku (makanaip parri) narceyti kurukirom. (Ataip parri) nir avanampikkaik kollatir'' enru kurinarkal
15|56|atarkavar, ‘‘valikettavarkalait tavira tan iraivanutaiya arulaip parri evantan avanampikkai kollakkutum'' enrar
15|57|(pinnar vanavarkalai nokki, ‘‘iraivanal) anuppappattavarkale! Unkal visayamenna?'' Enru kettar
15|58|atarkavarkal ‘‘(mikapperiya) kurram ceytu kontirukkum makkalitam (avarkalai alittuvita) meyyakave nankal anuppappattirukkirom'' enru kurinarkal
15|59|‘‘eninum, luttutaiya cantatikalait tavira (marra anaivaraiyum alittu vituvom). Niccayamaka nankal avar (cantati)kal anaivaraiyum patukattuk kolvom
15|60|eninum, avarutaiya manaiviyait tavira, niccayamaka aval (antap pavikalutan) tanki vituvalenru nam mutivu ceytuvittom'' (enru iraivan kuriyatakak kurinarkal)
15|61|(iraivanal) anuppappatta (av)vanavarkal luttutaiya kutumpattaritam vantapolutu
15|62|(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka ninkal (nan) ariyata makkalay irukkirirkale!'' Enru avar kurinar
15|63|atarkavarkal, ‘‘(unkal makkalakiya) ivarkal etaic cantekittuk kontiruntarkalo atai nam unkalitam kontu vantirukkirom
15|64|Meyyana visayattaiye nam unkalitam kontu vantirukkirom. Niccayamaka nam (avarkalai alittu vituvom, enru unkalukku) unmaiye kurukirom

15|65|akave, inriravil ciritu neram irukkumpolute ninkal unkal kutumpattinarai alaittukkontu, (avarkal munnum) ninkal pinnumakac cellunkal. Unkalil oruvarume tirumpip parkkatu unkalukku evappatta itattirkuc cenru vitunkal'' enrarkal
15|66|melum, niccayamaka ivarkal anaivarum vitivatarkullakave verarukkappattu vituvarkal enrum nam (avvanavarkal mulamaka) avarukku arivittom
15|67|(itarkitaiyil lut napiyin vittirku valiparkal cilar vantiruppataka arintu) avvurar mikka cantosattutan (lut napiyin vittirku) vantu (kuti) vittanar
15|68|(lut napi avarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka ivarkal en viruntalikal. Akave, (avarkal munpaka) ninkal ennai ilivu patuttatirkal
15|69|melum, ninkal allahvukkup payantu kollunkal; ennai avamanappatuttatirkal'' enru kurinar
15|70|atarkavarkal ‘‘ulakil yarayiruntalum (ciparicukku) ninkal varakkutatenru nam unkalait tatuttirukkavillaiya?'' Enru kurinarkal
15|71|atarkavar ‘‘ito! En pen makkal irukkinranar. Ninkal (etum) ceyte tiraventumenru karutinal (ivarkalait tirumanam) ceytu kollalam'' enru kurinar
15|72|(napiye!) Um mitu cattiyamaka! Avarkal putti mayanki (valikettil) tattalintu kontiruntarkal. (Atalal, atarku cevi caykkavillai)
15|73|akave, curiyan utittatarku pinnulla nerattai ataintapotu avarkalai itimulakkam pitittuk kontatu
15|74|Accamayam avarkal mitu cenkarkalai poliyac ceytu avarkalutaiya urai talaik kilakap purattivittom
15|75|unmaiyaik kantaripavarkalukku niccayamaka itil pala attatcikal irukkinrana
15|76|niccayamaka avvur (ninkal yattiraikku) varap pokakkutiya valiyiltan (innum) irukkiratu
15|77|niccayamaka itil nampikkaiyalarkalukku oru (nalla) patippinai irukkiratu
15|78|(ivarkalaip polave su'aiputaiya makkalakiya) topputaiyavarkalum niccayamaka aniyayakkararkalakave iruntanar
15|79|akave, avarkalaiyum nam pali vankinom. (Alinta) ivviru (makkalin) urkalum telivana valiyiltan irukkinrana
15|80|(ivvare) ‘hijr' ennum itattilirunta (samutu ennum) makkalum nam tutarkalaip poyyakkik kontiruntanar
15|81|nam avarkalukku namatu (pala) attatcikalaik kotuttiruntum, avarrai avarkal purakkanittuk konte vantarkal
15|82|accamarru valalam enak karuti avarkal malaikalaik kutaintu vitukal amaittarkal
15|83|avarkalaiyum vitiyarkalaiyil (perum) captam pitittukkontatu
15|84|avarkal (tankalai patukattuk kolla) ceytiruntavarril onrume avarkalukkup palanalikka villai

15|85|vanankalaiyum pumiyaiyum, ivarrukku mattiyil ullavarraiyum takka karanaminri nam pataikkavillai. (Napiye! Ivarkalutaiya tantanaikkuriya) kalam niccayamaka varakkutiyate! (Atuvarai ittiyavarkalin visamattai) nir kanniyamana muraiyil purakkanittu varuviraka
15|86|niccayamaka umatu iraivane (anaittaiyum) pataittavan, ivarkal anaivaraiyum) nankarintavan avan
15|87|(napiye!) Niccayamaka nam umakku tirumpat tirumpa otappatakkutiya elu vacanankalai (utaiya ‘al'hamtu' ennum attiyayattai)yum, inta makattana (mulu) kur'anaiyum alittirukkirom

15|88|(Pavikalakiya) ivarkal (ivvulakil) pala vakaikalilum cukamanupavikka ivarkalukku nam kotuttiruppavarrin pakkam nir umatu iru kankalaiyum nittatir; nir ivarkalukkaka kavalaiyum patatir. Eninum, nir nampikkaiyalarkalukku umatu panivana anpaik kattuviraka
15|89|‘‘niccayamaka nan telivana accamutti eccarikkai ceykiravan'' enrum kuruviraka
15|90|(napiye! Munnulla vetankalaip) palavarakap pirittavarkal mitu munnar nam (vetanaiyai) irakkiyavare
15|91|intak kur'anaip palavarakap pirippavarkal mitum (vetanaiyai irakki vaippom)
15|92|(akave,) umatu iraivan mitu cattiyamaka! Avarkal anaivaritamum kelvi kanakkuk ketpom
15|93|avarkal enna ceytu kontiruntarkal enpataip parri
15|94|akave, umakku evappattatai(t tayakkaminri) nir avarkalukku vivarittarivittu vituviraka. Melum, inaivaittu vanankum ivarkalaip purakkanittu vituviraka
15|95|parikacam ceyyum (ivarkalutaiya tinkai vittu) niccayamaka name um'maip patukappom
15|96|ivarkal (um'maip parikacippatu mattuma?) Allahvukku marroru (poyt) teyvattaik kuttakkukirarkal. (Itan palanai) pinnar ivarkal arintu kolvarkal
15|97|(napiye! Um'maip parri) avarkal (kevalamakak) kurupavai umatu ullattai nerukkukiratu enpatai niccayamaka nam arivom. (Atai nir oru ciritum porutpatuttatir)
15|98|nir umatu iraivanait tuti ceytu pukalntu avanukkuc ciram panintu vanankuviraka
15|99|umakku ‘ekin' (ennum maranam) erpatum varai (ivvare) umatu iraivanai vanankik kontiruppiraka
